response.overview: Ilham is a wealthy girl. Her uncle Hassan Bey seizes her money during her guardianship period. When the guardianship period ends, Ilham decides to marry a young man who works hard in his life. As a result of her cousin’s rejection and her marriage to the young man Samir, her uncle Hassan Bey is looking forward to To separate them, he claims his death, but the matter becomes clear later.
response.title: القافلة تسير
